item.description:
Hi,


We don't have a presenter for tomorrow night's meetup, but I'd love to meet anyways. I'll be over @ the Asgard @ 7.00 to talk about whatever you want to discuss . . . maybe continue some of the discussions from the last few months, network, anything . . . I'd like to talk about using flex with java; I might be able to get a presenter on this topic . . .

I'll be the guy with the 'meetUp' name tag. If you need to update your RSVP, please do, so that I can get an accurate headcount for the reserving a space.

Hope to see you there,


-John
item.how_to_find_us: 350 Mass ave, near intersection of Main and Mass Ave
item.name: The Boston Java October Meetup
